recipesJson.name: Give Thanks for Cookies!
recipesJson.author: SlashaLO
recipesJson.description: A Thanksgiving Cran-Raspberry Cookie! Sit back and enjoy the holidays!

reviews.text: I've mixed 60ml of this before a week before Christmas and I've been enjoying it ever since. The biscuit and the redness comes through brilliantly but what I like best is the touch of ginger on the exhale that pickles my tongue and it's delicious. I will mix this again because I love it! Another brilliant SlashaLo recipe and I hope you'll be awarded on the DIY or Die best everything in 2018, you already deserve it.
